initial_question.title: [javaagent] agent.sample_n_per_3_secs config stands for TraceSegment?
initial_question.body:
Dear skywalking team.
As I read skywalking agent code, **agent.sample_n_per_3_secs** this config stands for upper limit of TraceSegment, is it right?
As one TraceSegment can hold many spans, just suppose 1 TraceSegment has 3 spans, 
if **agent.sample_n_per_3_secs** set to 150, then the upper limit of spans has been 450.
Is it right?

satisfaction_conditions: Sampling rate configuration correctly limits trace segments per time period
System handles spans within trace segments appropriately
Trace functionality remains intact
Span limits per segment are configurable

initial_question.title: alarm's count properties real meaning?
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

i see official document and official alarm-setting.yml, count is represent as Frequency of occurrence or time[minute]?
for example:

1、official document 
Count. In the period window, if the number of values over threshold(by OP), reaches count, alarm should send

2、official alarm-setting.yml
  service_sla_rule:
    # Metrics value need to be long, double or int
    metrics-name: service_sla
    op: "<"
    threshold: 8000
    # The length of time to evaluate the metrics
    period: 10
    # How many times after the metrics match the condition, will trigger alarm
    count: 2
    # How many times of checks, the alarm keeps silence after alarm triggered, default as same as period.
    silence-period: 3
    message: **Successful rate of service {name} is lower than 80% in 2 minutes of last 10 minutes**

- Why do you submit this issue?

### Question

Explanation of the temporal evaluation mechanism
Definition of what constitutes a counted event
Clarification of the relationship between period and count parameters

initial_question.title: Skywalking 8+ causes Elasticsearch 6 failed to parse field [service_id] of type [integer]
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion
- [x] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?

___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
SkyWalking:8.1.0-es6 and 8.0.1-es6  (docker.io/apache/skywalking-oap-server:8.x.x)
OS :Red Hat 4.8.5-36(Linux version 3.10.0-957.21.3.el7.x86_64)
JRE:OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 3.8.0) (Alpine 8.171.11-r0)


- Which company or project?
Chengdu Eventec Technological Innovation Co.Ltd

- What happened?
If possible, provide a way to reproduce the error. e.g. demo application, component version.
ES6.6 throws MapperParsingException: failed to parse field [service_id] of type [integer], when skywalking-ui requests the skywalking-oap-server for data, even these causes ES cannot query any data from any index. 
I have made the following efforts several times:
1. Delete ES indexs refer to Skywalking if exists.
2. Deploy the skywalking-oap-server, skywalking-ui and our application.
3.Open skywalking-ui website, then I can see its DashBoard works fine(shows data), but other four Tabs(Topological Diagram, etc.) have no data.(The direct reason is that the network interface requests respond error.)

Our first application written with Springboot uses agent in apache-skywalking-apm-8.x.x.tar.gz to collect infomation. I cannot change SkyWalking version to below 8, because I have application written by Python, whose agent requires SkyWalking 8+.

The problem is urgent. Please contact me if possible , my wechat & mobile is 18551601581, thanks. 

Exceptions of ES are as belows :

1.
[2020-08-27T11:38:16,711][DEBUG][o.e.a.b.TransportShardBulkAction] [node-1] [eventec_endpoint_sla-20200827][0] failed to execute bulk item (index) index {[eventec_endpoint_sla-20200827][type][2020082711_c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2F5LWF1dGhlbn
RpY2F0aW9u.1_L3NlcnZpY2UtanNvbnN5bmMvc3luYy9jb2xsZWN0aW9uL2V2ZW50cw==], source[{"total":3,"service_id":"c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1","percentage":10000,"match":3,"time_bucket":2020082711,"entity_id":"c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2
F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1_L3NlcnZpY2UtanNvbnN5bmMvc3luYy9jb2xsZWN0aW9uL2V2ZW50cw=="}]}
org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.MapperParsingException: failed to parse field [service_id] of type [integer]
        at org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.FieldMapper.parse(FieldMapper.java:303) ~[elasticsearch-6.6.0.jar:6.6.0]
........
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1"
        at sun.misc.FloatingDecimal.readJavaFormatString(FloatingDecimal.java:2043) ~[?:?]

2.
[2020-08-27T11:38:16,706][DEBUG][o.e.a.b.TransportShardBulkAction] [node-1] [eventec_endpoint_relation_cpm-20200827][1] failed to execute bulk item (index) index {[eventec_endpoint_relation_cpm-20200827][type][202008271138_VXNlcg==.0
-VXNlcg==-c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1-L3NlcnZpY2UtY2hhc3Npc21vbml0b3IvZGV2aW5mbw==], source[{"child_endpoint_name":"/service-chassismonitor/devinfo","total":1,"service_id":"VXNlcg==.0","child_service_id":"c2VydmljZS1nY
XRld2F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1","time_bucket":202008271138,"entity_id":"VXNlcg==.0-VXNlcg==-c2VydmljZS1nYXRld2F5LWF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9u.1-L3NlcnZpY2UtY2hhc3Npc21vbml0b3IvZGV2aW5mbw==","value":1,"source_endpoint_name":"User"}]}
org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.MapperParsingException: failed to parse field [service_id] of type [integer]


___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe your requirements or improvement suggestions.

satisfaction_conditions: All UI tabs in Skywalking (Dashboard, Topological Diagram, etc.) must display data correctly
Elasticsearch must successfully process queries after system initialization
System must maintain functionality after clean deployment

initial_question.title: Application will not quit after main() done
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
Here is the example, assume that we have a class `Hello` as defined here

```java
public class Hello {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello, World!");
    }
}
```

after doing this

```bash
 java -javaagent:skywalking-agent.jar Hello
```
we should got `Hello, World!` at terminal stdout, and then the application should quit with status code `0` (which means process quit without any errors)

However, what I got is:
1. the stdout is ok
2. the application KEEPS RUNNING until I trigger `CTRL-C`.  

Maybe it's a normal circumstance when some non-daemon background threads are still running, but it's still quite a wired phenomenon where the application has done it's work and keeps running without any response for common developer.
___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.

satisfaction_conditions: Expected program output is displayed

Backward compatibility is maintained between cluster and agent versions

initial_question.title: how long will  modify  the SW_STORAGE_ES_RECORD_DATA_TTL  do effect ?
initial_question.body:
### Question
- What do you want to know?
First My cluster 's SW_STORAGE_ES_RECORD_DATA_TTL is default value (7 days)
now I change the value to 3 days .

I restart all my skywalking cluster nodes .But the index segment-****  still have 7  indeies.

satisfaction_conditions: TTL configuration change must eventually be reflected in data retention
System must maintain existing indices until scheduled cleanup
Changes must take effect at the next scheduled maintenance window

initial_question.title: [BUG] Can not locate agent jar file
initial_question.body:
when i use grpc register service find a problem，in my project add pom
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.skywalking</groupId>
    <artifactId>apm-agent-core</artifactId>
    <version>6.1.0</version>
</dependency>
and apm-agent-core.jar in WEB-INF/lib/
use main func run GRPCChannelManager connect success
but build my project as war in tomcat run connect fair  
error:Can not locate agent jar file
i found AgentPackagePath.findPath use ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader.getResource get URL
in my project return null so get error:Can not locate agent jar file
i change this code to 
URL resource = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResource(classResourcePath); 
if (resource == null) {
   resource = AgentPackagePath.class.getClassLoader().getResource(classResourcePath); 
}
in tomcat run connect success
but i am not sure this way is the best  can your give me some suggest

satisfaction_conditions: SkyWalking agent must not be included in application classpath
Agent loading must be configured at JVM level when monitoring is desired
Selective monitoring capability across applications in shared environment

initial_question.title: org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.receiver.trace.provider.parser.SegmentParseV2
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Which company or project?

initial_question.title: DiscoveryRestServiceClient :  Find server list fail
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
Configuring the collection server failed
___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
6.0.0
- Which company or project?

- What happen?

1. I completed the SkyWalking deployment on a server, which can be verified from the three ports that were launched.
2. I started the application on another server and expect to send the data to the server through the proxy. But unfortunately the following error has occurred:
```
ERROR 2018-12-18 19:40:50:358 DiscoveryRestServiceClient :  Find server list fail. 
org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.remote.RESTResponseStatusError: Unexpected service response code: 404
	at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.remote.DiscoveryRestServiceClient.findServerList(DiscoveryRestServiceClient.java:92)
	at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.remote.DiscoveryRestServiceClient.run(DiscoveryRestServiceClient.java:77)
	at org.apache.skywalking.apm.util.RunnableWithExceptionProtection.run(RunnableWithExceptionProtection.java:36)
	at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(FutureTask.java:308)
	at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:180)
	at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:294)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
```
3. I started to detect if I could connect to the other end on this server. The answer is yes. I can verify this problem with TELNET.
```
[root@dev /www/test-service]# telnet 10.0.0.0 11800
Trying 10.0.0.0...
Connected to 10.0.0.0.
Escape character is '^]'.
```
4. Since the target port is connectable, why doesn't SkyWalking think so?
```
collector.servers=10.0.0.0:11800
```

satisfaction_conditions: Network connectivity must be established between agent and collector

initial_question.title: Some questions about the agent collecting data
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?

- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [x] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- How often does the agent report data to the collector?Can it be configured?（探针发送数据的时间间隔是多少？是否能配置？）
- How big is the agent buffer setting? Can it be configured?（探针收集的数据缓存设置了多大？是否能配置？）

___
### Requirement or improvement
- Can you provide a custom collection strategy? Can do special requests will be collected。（能否提供自定义收集策略，可以做到指定特殊请求都会收集）

thank

satisfaction_conditions: Agent data reporting interval is clearly defined and documented
Buffer size parameters are accessible and configurable
Configuration options are documented and accessible through configuration files

initial_question.title: Is motan rpc supported from skywaking version 5.x?
initial_question.body:
Hi. Is motan rpc supported from skywaking version 5.x?

Because 5.x is not stable version, I download the version 3.2.6, but not found the motan support. Then I looked over the issue history, it seems motan rpc is not supported before skywalking version 5.x according to the issue timestamp.

Expect to your answer, 3q much.

satisfaction_conditions: Motan RPC functionality is successfully detected and traced by the SkyWalking system
The chosen SkyWalking version is stable enough for production use
Auto-instrumentation of Motan RPC works without manual configuration
Version compatibility between Motan RPC and SkyWalking is verified

initial_question.title: Does the alarm have documentation?
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [1 ] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question

See the alarm function, but do not know how to use
--using Google Translate

satisfaction_conditions: Configuration parameters for alarms must be clearly identified and accessible
Threshold values must be configurable
Documentation must be understandable despite language barriers
Different monitoring metrics must be distinctly defined

initial_question.title: druid + mysql：compatibility problem?

satisfaction_conditions: Database connection validation must work correctly when SkyWalking is active
Compatibility with existing Druid connection validation mechanisms
Minimal external dependencies required

initial_question.title: Tomcat8 + spring mvc：one http request create on span?
initial_question.body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.
### What version of sky-walking are you using?
最新版本

### What did you do?
技术点：tomcat8 + spring mvc
可能是我不太理解设计思路，一个http请求只会产生一个span，而不是tomcat 8和spring controller在各自的切面产生各自的span。虽各自类都能正常拦截，但引用的是同一个span，是不是同一个线程的关系吗？

satisfaction_conditions: Single span creation for one HTTP request
Proper span merging across components
Performance optimization maintained
